# Fantasuit
## Overview
**Type**: Magic Item
#Special-Item-Type/Magic-Item

**Group**: Wondrous Items
#Special-Item-Group/Wondrous-Items

**Rarity**: Very rare
#Special-Item-Rarity/Very-rare

**Attunement**: *(requires attunement)*

## Description
So long as the user of this *[[Mycelosuits|mycelosuit]]* is no less than 20 feet from the ground, they may move at their base land speed (ignoring any effects on movement due to terrain) in forests, cave systems, and any other environment with suitable anchoring positions (within base movement feet) for the vines that sprout from the fantasuit. These suits are made from [[Fantafungus|peaceful giant]] mushroom ([[Fantafungus|fantafungi]]).
